id.description: This attribute is an identifier to a specific element.

SourceSystemRef.description: This attribute is an identifier reference to a source system.

AgencyId.description: An ID value for an identifiable item generated by the agency. The contents of the field are not known; the provider could be using a VIN number, serial number, or a sequence number.

InsurerId.description: An ID value for an identifiable item generated by the insurer. The contents of the field are not known; the provider could be using a VIN number, serial number, or a sequence number.

SystemId.description: A Universally Unique Identifier for an Identifiable Item.

OtherIdentifier.description: This aggregate contains the information relating to the identification of something.
